item.title: Hugo-Tufte Features
item.description:
This is a quick demonstration post. It serves as an example of the features of this theme. One of them is $ \LaTeX $ via Katex.

A Bit About Mathematics

This is an example of an epigraph with some math $ \mathbb N \subseteq \mathbb R $ to start the beginning of a section.

Shawn O'Hare, Math is Fun

âŠ• The image title. This is the image caption. Image attribution -- About me Hello, I am a young researcher. I have a background in Mechanical Engineering and Computional Fluid Dynamics. Research I am curious about many natural and human phenomena, as well as novel engineering endeavours. I have developed numerical methods for modelling atmospheric re-entry (hypersonic) flows, and investigated aspects of hypersonic flows in my PhD.
